objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point Autofocus
• Film Simulation Modes
• Premium Retro Design

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• Fast and precise autofocus system with up to 77 AF points
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (2.36M-dot) for precise composition
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angles and selfies
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Film Simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm looks
• Full HD 1080p video recording capabilities
• Compatible with Fujifilm's excellent X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel and street photography
• Advanced manual controls with dedicated dials for essential settings
• Up to 8 FPS continuous shooting for action photography

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a bold and high-impact product promotion for a limited edition camera. The composition centers around a prominent product image ("product_image") on the right side, giving visual focus to the camera. To the left, a large uppercase title ("heading") in white paired with a striking red subheading ("subheading") creates a strong hierarchy. Beneath, a bullet-point list ("description") highlights product features in a clean, readable format. A product name ("product_name") and urgency tagline ("tagline") accentuate the urgency, followed by a standout price display ("price") and a red call-to-action button ("cta") underlined by a rounded rectangle ("cta_background"). The dark background features subtle red circular and line motifs for visual depth and contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #1A1A1A, #121212, #232323 (dark grayscale tones)
- Primary Text: #FFFFFF (white)
- Accent/Highlight: #CF1919 (vibrant red)
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera predominantly in a matte black body, giving it a sleek and professional look. The primary color is deep black (#0D0D0D), with subtle highlights of metallic grey (#5A5A5A) along the lens housing and dials, creating a sophisticated contrast. White text (#FFFFFF) is used dynamically on the body for branding and technical details, offering clean visibility. Small accents of red (#FF3224) and orange (#FFA500) near the lens provide vibrant focal pops. The color blending between textures is smooth but intentional, enhancing structure while maintaining high visual clarity and offering an ideal dark-modern palette for promotional use.
